      • Login

        public int Login(java.lang.String username,
                 java.lang.String password)
        Send a login message to the server, and return the associated UserID upon authentication.
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        Returns:
        The userID of the authenticated user if authenticated, -1 if invalid password, -2 if username not found, -3 unexpected

      • GetOpponent

        public java.lang.String[] GetOpponent(int gameID,
                                      int userID,
                                      int playerNumber)
        Polls the server to see if an opponent has joined a game
        Parameters:
        gameID - The gameID of the newly created game
        userID - The userID of the requester
        playerNumber - The playerNumber of the reuqestor (1 for white, 2 for black)
        Returns:
        The userID and username of the oppoenent as [userID, username]

      • JoinGame

        public java.lang.String[] JoinGame(int gameID,
                                   int userID)
        Requests to join game, returns opponent info if successful.
        Parameters:
        gameID - The ID of the game desired to be joined
        userID - The ID of the user requesting to join
        Returns:
        The opponent data as [userID,username,userNumber], or null on failure to join game
